name: Terrors
overview: The first genre of mobile games, the first in the “Novel Theater” series. With TERRORS that makes the most of Wonderswan's images and sounds, you can enjoy five stories about the theme of fear. Read through the text that appears on the screen, and select an option that appears everywhere. The story diverges and the ending changes. The branch by teller point that appears when the hero feels fear will lead to new fear.
